title: Reflective District
description: Reflective District: A 64-track atmospheric-electronic album designed to elevate your immersive and futuristic games.
longDescription:
Introducing "Reflective District: A Musical Journey through Futuristic Realms" â€“ the ultimate music pack for developers seeking captivating soundscapes.


Immerse yourself in an unparalleled experience with 64 meticulously crafted tracks spanning diverse genres like mid-tempo, slow tempo, synthwave & retrowave, ambient, and electronic. This sonic adventure will transport players to extraordinary realms, igniting their imagination and enhancing their gameplay.


Album Trailer (Youtube)


Inspired by the artists famous in the genre, One Man Symphony embarked on a passionate endeavor to capture the same atmospheric essence. Meticulously blending digital and physical synthesizers, each composition becomes a musical masterpiece, reflecting an extraordinary artistic journey.


Prepare for an audio voyage with 4 adrenaline-pumping action tracks and lose yourself in 9 captivating ambient - BGM tracks, perfectly suited to create mesmerizing backdrops for immersive gameplay. The album culminates with a stunning main theme song, encapsulating the essence of Reflective District.


Seamlessly transitioning between tracks is effortless, as each composition is meticulously crafted in the same key, ensuring a smooth and immersive listening experience. Whether developing futuristic, dystopian, or dark-themed games, this tailor-made music pack will heighten the mood, enveloping players in a world where shadows and technology collide.


With a total duration of 43 minutes (excluding sound effects packs), Reflective District offers an exquisite selection of music, with some tracks designed to be loopable, allowing for seamless extension of the enchanting ambiance within your game. Don't miss the opportunity to elevate your projects with this mesmerizing musical journey through futuristic realms.


Discover Reflective District and unlock the power of immersive soundscapes today! Experience the difference in your games with this exceptional music pack.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 64

Number of CUE Files: 64

Total Duration: 43 Minutes (Excluding Sound Effects)

Genre: Ambient, Atmospheric, Down-Tempo, Mid-Tempo, Synthwave, Retrowave, Electronic

Cue Files Included: Yes

Release Date: November 11, 2021

File Format: Lossless WAV

WAV Bit Depth: 16Bit Float

Bitrate: 450kbps

Does music loop: Some

Can Be Used In Multiple Projects?: Yes

Attribution Neccessary?: No

Can Be Edited or Remixed?: Yes

Supported Platforms: Windows, Linux, Mac
